quoteText: We may transfer your Personal Information to a third party in the event of a transfer of all or some of our assets to a third party, provided that the third party agrees to adhere to terms similar to those of this Privacy Policy. Where required by applicable law, We will provide you with an opportunity to reject the transfer of your Personal Information in such cases.
title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
